meanings.definition: To move in a circular motion
meanings.sent1: The toy top was precessing on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The planets in our solar system are constantly precessing around the sun.
meanings.sent3: The dancer precessed gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent4: The thoughts in his mind were precessing like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The helicopter blades were precessing rapidly above our heads.

meanings.definition: The act of rotating or spinning around an axis
meanings.sent1: The precessing of the Earth causes the change in seasons.
meanings.sent2: The gyroscope's precessing was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent3: The precessing of the fan created a cool breeze in the room.
meanings.sent4: The precessing of the windmill generated electricity for the village.
meanings.sent5: The precessing of the record player produced a soothing sound.
